Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory18.jpg'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "You're awake.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: '...Leader. I-is everyone okay?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "Nanami... Nanami's still in the tunnels! She was trying to save me and...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "It's okay.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "The Fortress is no longer a fortress. It's already destroyed.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "Everyone's hurt, but luckily not severely.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "And the savior of all this... she's still here, I think, she's waiting for you to wake.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "But we can't tell for sure if she has something to say to you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "We... we scavengers have something to tell her though. We'll need your help, Amy.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: 'Please tell Nanami.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: 'Tell her that we are thankful... and sorry.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory68.jpg'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "You're finally awake!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "...I'm sorry... Nanami... I'm sorry...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "We're the ones attacking the Constructs from Babylonia.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: 'We lied. We baited them to the hunting grounds, then recycled their scrap parts to exchange for food and resources...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "I... know it's wrong... I know... but I couldn't stop it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Mhm... But didn't Amy also secretly give the only energy valves left for the trapped Constructs?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "No, it's not like... I... I was just hesitant... I know I've been kept alive through resources gained from this scheme, but then I self-complacently helped the Constructs...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hmm... Nanami still doesn't quite understand.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'But, the fact that the scavengers are the culprits.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami already knew from the start.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: 'From the start...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Yep. It's as if you all wanted to be found out, there were a lot of clues.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: 'You knew it was a trap...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "Then why didn't you expose us? Why did you step right in instead?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: 'With how powerful you are, you could have taken out all of us...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: 'And... when the Fortress appeared, you could have left us alone, why did you save us?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'If you just die, then nothing is truly solved.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "When humans die, nothing's left of them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'At least Nanami knows this much.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And more importantly!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Amy and Nanami are friends!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Right or wrong, that's too complicated for Nanami.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But Nanami thinks that, if Amy's alive, and Nanami's friends are alive, then it would be pretty nice.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz803.jpg'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Oh... Amy... are you... crying...?'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "...I'm so glad... we can be friends."}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "I'm so glad... you came here."}
{2: 'Amy', 3: 'Thank you, Nanami...'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '(Nods)'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory68.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Amy', 3: "Anyway, what's that in your hand, Nanami?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's my super-duper important diary! I write everything that's important in it!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "What's all this scribbling...? It's all the same name...?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "【kuroname】...? Who's that?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's the name of someone who means a lot to me!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Now, I wanna write your name down, too, Amy!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I wanna make a hundred living friends!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Well, I wanted to just make a hundred friends, but they kept dying.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I didn't want that to happen, so I changed my mind.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And if all my friends are alive—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Won't the world be a better place?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory18.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant, we've reported the relevant Scavenger data to Babylonia. As for judgment and disposal, that will be left for the Science Council to adjudicate.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The support request will also be decided by the Council, then organized for the families to be contacted.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...We came because we were worried but looks like everything's fine.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Did you hear... the commandant's name just now?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, why not just go talk to Nanami?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nothing wrong with staying behind the scenes every now and then.', 3: '103', 4: "Now's not really the time...", 5: '103'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Are we really... going back now?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Not to mention, she was willing to risk her life on such a dangerous mission just because she was worried about the commandant seeing her new frame so soon...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If she doesn't see us when she comes back, won't that invalidate everything she did?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Understood, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Gray Raven, prepare to return to base.', 4: '1'}
